name: css-frameworks-ca
description: A starting point for the CSS Frameworks CA project

scripts.build-netlify: npm run build-css && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-html
scripts.copy-html: npx shx mkdir -p dist/profile && npx shx mkdir -p dist/feed && npx shx cp ./*.html dist/ && npx shx cp profile/index.html dist/profile/ && npx shx cp feed/index.html dist/feed/
